name: as-demo-queue-manager
description: Queue and session manager for Combined Assistant Skills demo

scripts.lint: oxlint *.js config/*.js config/platforms/*.js services/*.js routes/*.js handlers/*.js lib/*.js
scripts.lint:fix: oxlint *.js config/*.js config/platforms/*.js services/*.js routes/*.js handlers/*.js lib/*.js --fix
scripts.test: env -u SPLUNK_URL -u SPLUNK_PASSWORD -u SPLUNK_USERNAME -u SPLUNK_HEC_TOKEN -u JIRA_API_TOKEN -u JIRA_EMAIL -u JIRA_SITE_URL -u CONFLUENCE_API_TOKEN -u CONFLUENCE_EMAIL -u CONFLUENCE_SITE_URL vitest run
scripts.test:watch: env -u SPLUNK_URL -u SPLUNK_PASSWORD -u SPLUNK_USERNAME -u SPLUNK_HEC_TOKEN -u JIRA_API_TOKEN -u JIRA_EMAIL -u JIRA_SITE_URL -u CONFLUENCE_API_TOKEN -u CONFLUENCE_EMAIL -u CONFLUENCE_SITE_URL vitest
scripts.test:coverage: env -u SPLUNK_URL -u SPLUNK_PASSWORD -u SPLUNK_USERNAME -u SPLUNK_HEC_TOKEN -u JIRA_API_TOKEN -u JIRA_EMAIL -u JIRA_SITE_URL -u CONFLUENCE_API_TOKEN -u CONFLUENCE_EMAIL -u CONFLUENCE_SITE_URL vitest run --coverage
